intervals.text: I've left the fire on for too long. I should smother it before I burn down my walls.
It's burning low. If I don't find more kindling, it'll be out before the night's done.
My cold skin is prickling by the heat of the fire. I should get closer.
Well, the fire feels great, though it won't do much for my frostbite. Time to cut my hands off. :(
While I'm over here, I should put the soup on.
If I leave my boots by the fire to dry, they'll be nice and warm when I come back.
The boots are dry. I should grab them before I go back outside.
The boots aren't quite dry yet. I'll come back in a bit.
Alright... that's enough logs. It should burn for quite a while.
It has plenty of logs. It should burn for quite a while.

prompt.text: Put on another for good measure.

intervals.text: Might as well put on a few more logs.
Could probably use a few more logs.
The fire has completely burned out.
The fire is comforting. I can make out no other lights in the surrounding wood.
